info.title: Bump into the top edge of a Nested modal dialog

raw.name: JAWS
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the PC cursor is active, press <kbd>Escape</kbd> to activate the virtual cursor.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the virtual cursor is active, press <kbd>Insert</kbd>+<kbd>z</kbd> to disable the virtual cursor.

setupScript.scriptDescription: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' dialog followed by the 'Address Added' dialog, and sets focus on the 'Address added' heading inside the second dialog
setupScript.name: openAddressAddedDialogAndFocusAddressAddedHeading

instructions.instructions: Starting at the 'Address Added' heading inside the nested dialog, make multiple attempts to navigate past the top edge

virtualCursor: Configure JAWS with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.
Press <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>Delete</kbd> to determine which cursor is active.
If the PC cursor is active, press <kbd>Escape</kbd> to activate the virtual cursor.

commands.keystroke: Up Arrow then Up Arrow then Insert+Up Arrow

assertions.assertionStatement: Screen reader cursor is positioned at heading 'Address Added'
assertions.assertionPhrase: position screen reader cursor at heading 'Address Added'

tokenizedAssertionStatements.jaws: The virtual cursor is positioned at heading 'Address Added'
tokenizedAssertionStatements.nvda: The browse mode caret is positioned at heading 'Address Added'
tokenizedAssertionStatements.voiceover_macos: The VoiceOver cursor is positioned at heading 'Address Added'

tokenizedAssertionPhrases.jaws: position the virtual cursor at heading 'Address Added'
tokenizedAssertionPhrases.nvda: position the browse mode caret at heading 'Address Added'
tokenizedAssertionPhrases.voiceover_macos: position the VoiceOver cursor at heading 'Address Added'
